author: Brandon Sanderson
quote: The most important words a man can say are, 'I will do better.' These are not the most important words any man can say. I am a man, and they are what I needed to say.

author: Brandon Sanderson
quote: Expectation was like a warm bed you could never quite leave behind.

author: Brandon Sanderson
quote: Sometimes a hypocrite is nothing more than a man in the process of changing.

author: Brandon Sanderson
quote: Life before death. Strength before weakness. Journey before destination.

author: Brandon Sanderson
quote: The purpose of a storyteller is not to tell you how to think, but to give you questions to think upon.

author: Robert Jordan
quote: The Wheel of Time turns, and Ages come and pass, leaving memories that become legend. Legend fades to myth, and even myth is long forgotten when the Age that gave it birth comes again.

author: Robert Jordan
quote: Death is lighter than a feather, duty heavier than a mountain.

author: Robert Jordan
quote: There are no endings, and never will be endings, to the turning of the Wheel of Time.

author: Robert Jordan
quote: The rose petal floats on water. The kingfisher flashes above the pond. Life and beauty swirl in the midst of death.

author: Robert Jordan
quote: The oak fought the wind and was broken, the willow bent when it must and survived.
